recipe.title: Turkey Meatballs
ingredients: 1 tbsp tomato paste or 2 tbsp ketchup
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine all the ingredients and mix thoroughly. Form meatballs from 1 tbsp of mixture mold into the shape of a ball. Bake 15 to 20 minutes on a lightly oiled 10 x 15 x 1 inch pan, or until the meatballs are no longer pink in the center.
